name: Nia
description:
Update 3: Music, Ethan wanted it. Listen to it, it's unironically awesome. Also added Max's CGs as a download, if the game mechanic is not clicking with you, you can still see the awesome final CG.

Update 2: Even more nerfed, per Ethan's request <_<, and fixed a problem with lvl 3. Something went wonky during the last merge (damn you Unity Collab)

Update: Had a few complaints about difficulty, made the game more manageable. There's some unique assets that Max and Ethan spent a long time making so it's a shame that some people can't reach it because of difficulty, Download the nerfed build for an easier experience!

A simple, but challenging, 2D platformer about a dog chasing down their owner in the wilderness of their home Dautha island. Your only saving grace is your trusty red rubber ball. By launching it, you are able to boost towards it, allowing you to make otherwise impossible jumps. Use this ability of yours to find your owner or else...

Ruin awaits.

Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Left click to shoot ball anytime

Right click to boost to ball

One boost per jump

Game made by The Berries:

Kristofer Elmarsson - Developer (https://idecamuffs.itch.io)

Daniel Hiss - Developer (https://d4nwh4l3.itch.io/)

Ethan Baum - Music (https://scotu.itch.io/)

Max Niederer - Art (https://2096.itch.io/)

Narrative made collaboratively!
